text: The Toronto Sun is an English language daily tabloid newspaper published in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. It is often seen as a working person's newspaper. As of the end of 2007, the Sun sold 180,000 newspapers during Monday to Saturday and about 310,000 papers on Sunday. ==Related pages== * The Sun (United Kingdom) - The original UK version ==References== ==Other websites== * * Article on the Sun - includes rough circulation info Category:1971 establishments in Canada Category:Newspapers published in Canada Category:English-language newspapers published in Canada
title: Toronto Sun
